channel.title: Ira L. Parsons
channel.description: Recent content on Ira L. Parsons

item.title: About
item.description: Ira is a graduate research assistant in the department of Wildlife, Fisheries, and Aquaculture as well as the Animal Dairy Sciences at Mississippi State University. Growing up on the family farm in Northeast Kansas, Ira developed a love and passion for animals, the outdoors and nature. He received his bachelors from Kansas State University in 2015, where he majored in Feed Science and Management. Driven by a desire to learn and pursue a career with animals, he joined the class of â€™17 at Texas A&M in College Station, where he received his Master of Science in Animal Science.
